title: Will there be any new water lines run to Bayshore Estates.  We have sewer here but no County Water.
text:
We're not getting a callback from Bayshore Estates right away, but
wanted to give you their contact information on your specific
question: (910) 442-2030.

The Cape Fear Public Utility Authority may also have the answer for
you: (910) 332-6550.

Thanks for using MyReporter.com
